page.title: 01NW area of Knowstone Parish
page.content: This area is mainly the parish of Knowstone, with the crooked oak valley, but the Northern 3 squares are the southern parish of Ausley, being the other side of the main trunk road to North Devon the A361. The southern 4 kilometer squares include the tiny villages of Knowstone and East Knowstone. Knowstone is in the valley of the crooked oak, where the ground drains well into the river oak, and there are several farms and pretty houses along this area, being protected from the winds. East Knowstone is situtated in the South Eastern block (12) and is positioned on the side of steep hills. The centre blocks (5 to 8) are reclaimed farming fields, which were moorland, but are now drained to carry sheep and some beef. the block 1 to 4 are areas either side of the A361 which is also
